sentences.sentence: A math teacher forced into skullduggery!
sentences.translation: 一个数学教师居然被逼到要去盗窃！

sentences.sentence: Within seconds, Tyson repeated the same skullduggery and was promptly disqualified.
sentences.translation: 其后几秒内，泰森又重复了同样的咬人动作，于是他立马被取消了比赛资格。

sentences.sentence: A captivating, engrossing debut, …a fast-paced tale of international crime and skullduggery written with style and panache.
sentences.translation: 一个快节奏的跨国犯罪和诈骗的故事，风格独特，文笔华丽。
